short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically mutes ads on Hotstar and SonyLIV

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Streaming Ad Muter automatically detects and mutes video advertisements on Hotstar. When ads appear during movies or shows, the extension intelligently mutes your tab and restores volume when the ad ends. No more scrambling to adjust volume during ad breaks - enjoy uninterrupted viewing without disruptive ad audio. Works seamlessly across Hotstar's movie library. Respects your browser's permissions and doesn't collect any user data.

Note: Currently optimized for Hotstar, with plans to support more streaming platforms in future updates.
